DURATION #


                    Context:

metadata.title: Erowid Diphenhydramine Vault : Effects
metadata.description: Information about the mental and physical effects of diphenhydramine.

content:
Drug: Diphenhydramine | cid: 3100
Source: erowid | Source description: Information about the mental and physical effects of diphenhydramine.
Erowid name: diphenhydramine
Category: PHARMS
Field: Effects

                    Text: 
                    This reusable "Ecobag" is made of 100% recycled mid-weight (10 oz) cotton canvas, printed with the Erowid logo.

Donate now and receive yours!

Diphenhydramine

Effects

by Erowid

DURATION #

Caution : Reactions and experiences may vary dramatically from person to person. [see below]

EFFECTS LIST #

POSITIVE

increased awareness and appreciation of music

dream-like experiences

muscle relaxation

NEUTRAL

visual distortions

auditory hallucinations / sound distortions

unusual thoughts and speech

delirious confusion

flushed skin

microsleep / nodding (at high doses)

NEGATIVE

sensitivity to sunlight

loss of coordination

dry mouth

blurred vision, difficulty focusing eyes (lasts 4-24 hours, increases with higher doses))

confusion, disorientation

dizziness

drowsiness during daytime

muscle cramps

nausea, vomitting (at higher doses)

temporary erectile dysfunction

nervousness

difficulty differentiating hallucinations from reality

DESCRIPTION #


                    Context: 
                    This section lists the positive, neutral, and negative effects of diphenhydramine use, including typical experiences and cautions, as part of Erowid's broader informational page on the substance, situated after a brief promotional note about an Erowid tote bag.

metadata.title: Erowid Diphenhydramine Vault : Effects
metadata.description: Information about the mental and physical effects of diphenhydramine.

content:
Drug: Diphenhydramine | cid: 3100
Source: erowid | Source description: Information about the mental and physical effects of diphenhydramine.
Erowid name: diphenhydramine
Category: PHARMS
Field: Effects

                    Text: 
                    drowsiness during daytime

muscle cramps

nausea, vomitting (at higher doses)

temporary erectile dysfunction

nervousness

difficulty differentiating hallucinations from reality

DESCRIPTION #

Higher doses are often accompanied by hallucinations (seeing and interacting with people, creatures, or objects that aren't there, or NOT seeing things that are actually there, like cars) and dissociation.

Contraindications

READ THE LABEL - avoid using preparations that contain acetaminophen/paracetamol (Tylenol) or aspirin.

Diphenhydramine used in combination with alcohol, some pharmaceuticals or OTC remedies can increase risk of adverse reaction, including renal failure and death.

CAUTION & DISCLAIMER #


                    Context: 
                    This chunk lists negative side effects and cautions related to diphenhydramine use, highlighting symptoms such as daytime drowsiness, muscle cramps, nausea, erectile dysfunction, nervousness, and difficulty distinguishing hallucinations from reality. It notes that higher doses can cause hallucinations and dissociation, and provides warnings about dangerous drug interactions and the importance of reading medication labels. This information is part of Erowid's overview of diphenhydramine's effects, extracted from user reports and research.

metadata.title: Erowid Diphenhydramine Vault : Effects
metadata.description: Information about the mental and physical effects of diphenhydramine.

content:
Drug: Diphenhydramine | cid: 3100
Source: erowid | Source description: Information about the mental and physical effects of diphenhydramine.
Erowid name: diphenhydramine
Category: PHARMS
Field: Effects

                    Text: 
                    Diphenhydramine used in combination with alcohol, some pharmaceuticals or OTC remedies can increase risk of adverse reaction, including renal failure and death.

CAUTION & DISCLAIMER #

Erowid's effects information is a summary of data gathered from users, research, and other resources. This information is intended to describe the range of effects people report experiencing. Effects may vary dramatically from one person to another or one experience to another based on a variety of factors such as body chemistry, age, gender, physical health, dose, form of material, etc.

RELATED RESOURCES #

RELATED LINKS #

None

                    Context: 
                    This section appears at the end of the Erowid diphenhydramine effects page, following the list of positive, neutral, and negative effects, as well as a caution about combining diphenhydramine with other substances. It includes a disclaimer about the variability of reported effects, references to related resources, and site navigation links.
